page.title: 05R.S.P.C.A. Headquarters.
page.content: {Millbrook Animal Centre {R.S.P.C.A. Headquarters. We visited the centre on July 3rd 1985.It is the largest established of the R.S.P.C.A. Headquarters homes, having been given in 1965. We were shown round by a lady who had worked there for 6 years and knew the system well.The centre covers 17.5 acres and has accomodation for{guinea {pigs}and other small animals.At present they have two baby{deer}which well meaning people have'saved' from the local area although they had merely been left for the day by the does;in addition there is ample housing for{dogs}and a modern{cattery. The staff arrive at 8.30 in the morning and let the dogs out of their indoor pens into their runs.At about 9a.m. the dogs are fed Vitalise and Tripe,with puppy mix for the{puppies.
